properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 c3 v1 c1 c2 c3 v2 c1 c2 c3 v3 c1 c2 c3

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Receive our gifts
we bring before you.
Receive our gifts
we bring before you. x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Our hearts of praise,
we bring before you.
Our thanks giving,
we bring before you.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
(Father of heaven,
Oh receive our gifts.
Oh Lord of mercy,
Oh receive our gifts, Father). x2
Receive our gifts Father,
of heaven.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Look upon our offerings
look within,
within our hearts.
Lord accept our everything
make us one with
you oh Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bread and wine
we bring to you,
in this mass
transform our hearts.
All our joy and all our pain,
we bring Lord
to praise your name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
What have we
to offer you,
Oh Lord of heavâ€™n
and earth.
Lord accept our nothingness,
make us one
with you oh Lord.
